_meta.description: Global physics settings for tire friction curves
notes: Friction curves define how grip changes with wheel slip
slip_ratio: 0.0 = no slip, 1.0 = 100% slip (wheel spinning 2x ground speed)
friction_multiplier: multiplied by tire mu for final friction
Generous curve maintains grip at high slip (arcade-like)
Punishing curve drops grip at high slip (sim-like, TCS matters)

generous.name: Generous (Arcade)
generous.description: Maintains 85-90% grip even at extreme wheelspin. TCS has minimal impact.

punishing.name: Punishing (Sim)
punishing.description: Grip drops to 60% at 100% slip. TCS/launch control matters for acceleration.

realistic.name: Realistic (Pacejka-inspired)
realistic.description: Peak at 6% slip, gradual dropoff. Balanced between arcade and sim.
